title: Idea → Reality: AutoCAD 101
description: Beginner-friendly hands-on workshop introducing 2D drafting and basic 3D modelling using AutoCAD.
overview: An introductory workshop designed to help students understand how real-world designs begin as digital drawings. Participants explored AutoCAD’s interface, practiced essential 2D tools, and took their first steps into basic 3D modelling.
takeaways: Confidence using AutoCAD for academic work

title: Model Mania
description: A 3D character modelling competition encouraging creativity with no theme or limits.
overview: Model Mania is a 3D character modelling competition by DesCon Society where participants bring characters to life using Blender, Fusion 360, or any 3D software of their choice. Participants can design an original character or recreate a favorite fictional icon, with complete creative freedom and no predefined theme.
